column5: LTBR Ok then all the Tweets have been synchronized AND the most important words you will hear in the short termGAINnuclear voucher enabling Framatome in collaboration with Idaho National Laboratory INL to apply focused attention on key licensing steps to commercialize Lightbricge Fuel

1 Not surprised we didnt receive DoE grant as only 11m available in Round 52 Disappointed to see new ATM at this stage If more funding needed in addition to 20m cash in bank there are surely better financing or strategic funding options Framatome Fluor etc 3 Intrigued by Framatome social media in the last two days pushing LTBR Fuelperhaps an indicator that we may get Exelon Calvert Cliffs deal announcement sooner than expectedunless you were expecting first utility deal in 2018 or early 2019 Lightbridge Fuel will give Framatome and EDF a clear competitive advantage over GE and Westinghouse It appears that Framatome and EDF are looking to bring this competitive advantage into play sooner than JW initially indicated with an aggressive development planGLAShow More

LTBR the only control we all have is in or out the rest is cheerleading at best There is no free flow of information and it is meant to be that way Further dilution right now is absurd Even a good pump will lead to a dump and eventual RS if no follow through Having said that typical Nasdaq Index fund makes returns 89 per year IF fully invested and dollar cost averaging At 7 it takes 10 years to double your money Stock is at 85 You do the math Obviously much greater Beta in LTBR Fred can light you up with some alternatives Im sure 5 years ago I invested in AVII now SRPT Made some small money thought the science was good sold around 300 after holding for 2 years11836 today you get my point GTLA

LTBR Do you have any idea how simple stock suppression is for those with cash or access to unlimited free cash from the Fed see Too Big To Fail Ive explained how its done many times Yes the CEO is a complete moron However look at the industry support The 3lobe Russian design tested successfully 5 years ago The McCainNudelmanBiden coup in Ukraine closed our Russian office Nobody gives details about contract negotiations in progress so as not to be frontrun We will be part of a tech package to bring nuclear power to Saudi Arabia and Qatar Who cares about the DoE retards who are too incompetent and corrupt to make it in the private sector Stock trading fundamental News releases are selling events not a buy Rumors are the buys How many rumors do we have floating right now We should have been treading water in the 1530 range for the last 4 years Instead here we are because of manipulation by those who stand to lose everything when we commercialize
